name: places/ChIJn1nGNqFYwokR2IDBgkd4sFo
formattedAddress: 1379 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1379 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10128-0711, USA

editorialSummary.text: Enduring retailer offering flowers from all over & elegant floral arrangements for any occasion.

originalText.text: Great experience getting flowers from Jerome Florists! I purchased the Iridescent arrangement for my one-year anniversary with my girlfriend, and she loved it. It was an elegant and fresh arrangement that was quickly delivered. The owner was very helpful and friendly in taking my order. I'm getting my Valentine's Day flowers here as well and will definitely be using Jerome Florist for all occasions going forward!

text.text: Great experience getting flowers from Jerome Florists! I purchased the Iridescent arrangement for my one-year anniversary with my girlfriend, and she loved it. It was an elegant and fresh arrangement that was quickly delivered. The owner was very helpful and friendly in taking my order. I'm getting my Valentine's Day flowers here as well and will definitely be using Jerome Florist for all occasions going forward!

originalText.text: I recently used Jerome Florist for an event that I hosted at the New York Athletic Club, and they were wonderful to work with. We had a particular idea in mind for the centerpieces, which they worked with us to make come to life, and for the bar florals, we let them design it with little input, and we were blown away. I will definitely be using Jerome Florists whenever we have events in NYC!

text.text: I recently used Jerome Florist for an event that I hosted at the New York Athletic Club, and they were wonderful to work with. We had a particular idea in mind for the centerpieces, which they worked with us to make come to life, and for the bar florals, we let them design it with little input, and we were blown away. I will definitely be using Jerome Florists whenever we have events in NYC!

originalText.text: The manager of this shop was so thoughtful when I told him I could only afford a certain price for flowers that would be a house warming gift for my close friend. I expected to leave with a tiny flower but he gave me a deal to take a bigger orchid as they rolled their stock over to the next season for a great price within my budget. Not only was I able to give my friend a lovely sized gift for a gods price, but his compassion and thoughtfulness towards my needs and affordability was beyond kind. I will continue to come back here for all my floral gift needs. Sending so much love to this shop and its team!

originalText.text:
Peter and Constantine were super helpful and considerate to our budget and scope for the wedding.  No pressure for upselling, great design choices, personal time put into each partners preferences.  These gentlemen are pros from the macro to the micro.

If you have the opportunity to work with them it’s a blessing and great weight off the logistics of any event or small flowers needs.

Truly a blend of family and professional sentiment when handling their business.

The work was beautiful from the arch to the table centerpieces and the bouquets. Highly recommend them!!!

originalText.text: I'm so happy with this gorgeous arrangement!  I ordered the "Elegance" bouquet online and had a few questions, so I called the florist who was super helpful and friendly and even delivered my flowers to me within a couple of hours.  I'm extremely pleased with the quality of the flowers, styling, and service!
